DESCRIPTIONS: Making your way through the hazards of the Exordium, you come across a robot in shambles, crawling across the floor. NL It reaches towards you as if it were asking @"Help@ Me."@
You grab the robot's hand and you feel ~#bpower~ surging through you. NL The robot let go as quick as it latched on and fell to the floor, inoperational.
